review: I love my google chromecast! Why spend an extra $100+ on a smart TV when you can turn any "dumb" TV into a full featured streaming device!I've had a Chromecast for a little over a year now and it's been the best thing for someone who cut the cable and uses online streaming services (such as Netflix and Hulu) to watch all my shows. In addition to an OTA (over the air) antenna for local news, you can truly cut the cable with a chromecast. I don't have any experience with other streaming devices, but I can say the low price tag on this google device is what drew me to it. It plays movies, TV shows, music, photos, and more without any connection issues and is very responsive. It's never crashed on me and never had an issue connecting to my wifi (although it is only 2.4ghz).The Chromecast is perfect for any living room, bedroom, kitchen or any other place you have a TV, and with the low price tag you can afford to make every TV in your house a Smart TV! One added benefit when I bought mine was that Google offered a $20 google play credit for chromecast owners, making this device almost free. Would definitely recommend to any person looking for a streaming device.
author: Michael
